description:
This is Starr Hall's COMPLETE “How to Become a Professional Speaker” COURSE which includes a four module self study webcast training that will teach YOU how to develop your speaking foundation and build it into a 6/7 figure speaking empire.  All webcasts include a complete action guide with templates and resources that you need to make this happen. This is a self study course that you can access at any time and complete actions as your schedule permits.

Module One:

Your speaking foundation- Starr will teach you how to set up your speaker’s kit, topics, speaking fees and speaking brand.

Module Two:

You will learn how to find speaking opportunities that will pay you AND create your on site sales offerings and approach.

Module Three:

Get ready to create your speaking pitches and get them sent out to get those PAID bookings- Starr will walk you through this step-by-step. This module also includes how to get sponsors.

Module Four:

Setting up your speaker's contract AND how to get publicity and media coverage when you speak.

Starr has been a professional speaker since she was 19 years old. With 20 years of speaking experience, Starr continues to build her six figure speaking empire as well as her brand exposure around the globe. She will teach you her tips, techniques, templates, give you her resources and yes- step by step training on how to build YOUR speaking brand and make money doing it. Now touring with Entrepreneur Magazine, sponsored by Deluxe and Sprint, Starr has a full time speaking schedule already booking through Fall 2012 with new sponsors and she gets paid for every speaking engagement. She has also landed a second book deal due to her speaking exposure- The Social Wave book is included with this “How to Become a Professional Speaker “course. 

Take this course now and learn how to become a professional speaker.

</p>
title: How to Become a Six Figure Income Professional Speaker
